<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/tickets/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



根据工单 ID 更新工单信息。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"工单 ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string"},"content":{"type":"string"},"priority":{"type":"string","enum":["low","medium","high"]},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["open","in_progress","closed"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"TicketUpdateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"更新成功","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"tkt_10001"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"New Ticket Title"},"content":{"type":"string","example":"Ticket content description"},"priority":{"type":"string","enum":["low","medium","high"],"example":"medium"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["open","in_progress","closed"],"example":"open"},"assigneeId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"u_987654321"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"required":["id","title","content","priority","status"],"title":"Ticket"}}}},"400":{"description":"参数不合法"},"401":{"description":"未授权"},"404":{"description":"工单不存在"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
